entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error with sign XML exception "Cryptography_Xml_CreateHashAlgorithmFailed" in iOS .net 8 #102033
  • [API Proposal]: Provide control over growth rate of AsnWriter #102031
  • arm32 fails in CI with "/lib/arm-linux-gnueabihf/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.34' not found" #102030
  • Application Not Looking in Working Directory for .NET #102028
  • DynamicallyAccessedMembers attribute ignored on generic attribute when publishing for AOT #102023
  • Remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure in dotnet linux #102018
  • Dependency injection does not respect unmanaged constraint #102016
  • BinaryFormatter PayloadReader API #102014
    9.0.0
  • Strange JMP over NOP in try-catch-finally #102013
  • Blazor WASM: breakpoints on property setter not hit #102012
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT][API Proposal]: Provide an API to transfer JS objects between main browser thread and JSWebWorker contexts #102011
  • [NativeAOT] Static lib linking looking for dynamic lib in linux #102020
  • [browser][mt] JSWebWorker crashes the runtime #102010
  • Mono is calling derived class function instead of base class function when base's function is invoked using delegate. #102009
  • ILLink: Preserve implementation for default static interface methods #102008
  • JsonConverter fails with nullable enums. #102006

Closed

  • Error with sign XML exception in iOS .net 8 #102032
  • Assertion failed '(constIndexOffset % elemSize) == 0' #67870
    9.0.0
  • .NET 9 Runtime Async Experiment #94620
    9.0.0
  • Reflection does not respect unmanaged constraint #102017
  • [API Proposal]: `ValueTask.ConfigureAwait(ConfigureAwaitOptions)` #102019
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/NETClients/IDispatch/NETClientIDispatch/NETClientIDispatch.cmd #101959
  • icudt_EFIGS.dat is never recognized by Blazor #101992
    9.0.0
  • C# compiler generates highly suboptimal code for compound assignments with struct ref variables #100008
  • Test failure: Loader/classloader/RefFields/Validate/Validate.cmd #101964
  • Test failure: GC\\API\\GCHandle\\Alloc\\Alloc.cmd #101961
    9.0.0
  • ARM32 Year 2038 issue #96460
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Pin arm image to unblock ci #102035
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Enable RuntimeType.GenericCache to hold multiple types of cache entries #102034
    area-System.Runtime, runtime-coreclr
  • [mono] Use simdhash for aot method lookup ptr->methodinfo cache #102029
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Add more issue links to trimmer assertions #102027
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • ILLink: Add PropertyNode for dependency analysis #102026
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Expand optRelopImpliesRelop for constants as op1 #102024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement SVE Math Fused* APIs #102007
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve

Merged

  • Remove ThreadNative_GetProcessDefaultStackSize #102003
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Small followup to Use QueueUserAPC2 for EE suspension on CoreCLR win-arm64 #102021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update SPMI collection script for ASP.NET #102025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: SVE Cleanup - Merging some similar SVE formats into `SVE_AT_3A` #101958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Profile AOT: Relax is_local_inst to let more methods qualified for AOT compilation #101987
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Update area owners #102022
    area-Meta
  • Use QueueUserAPC2 for EE suspension on CoreCLR win-arm64. #101891
    arch-arm64, os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #101725
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Fix typo #102015
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Move issue links from comments to the warning attributes in trimming tests. #101819
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Explicitly link against the dotnet/llvm-project libc++ #102001
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove O1K_VALUE_NUMBER #101894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold nullchecks in Interlocked.* #101956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Partially revert "Disable msvc vectorization in GC get_promoted_bytes (#100309)" #101995
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Rewrite initial parameter frame layout in terms of new ABI info #101340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Declare __cxa_demangle where it's used based on the Itanium ABI instead of including the ABI header. #101997
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates work (Backport crossgen2 changes) #101869
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable AVX512 embedded masking for most other intrinsics #101886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cdac] Read types from contract descriptor #101994
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add PipeWriter overloads to Json #101461
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Visit switch successors in increasing likelihood order for RPO-based layout #101935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT CSE Optimization - Add a gymnasium environment for reinforcement learning #101856
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add dynamic allocation sampling following a Poisson process instead of using a static threshold #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Experiment] Change temporary entrypoints to be lazily allocated #101580
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 1 #101950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add custom mmap/munmap implementation for anonymous mappings #101871
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] `clang -fuse-ld=lld` output is low priority #102000
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove snapcraft files #101768
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Utilize new APIs in the WebSocket implementation #101953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [mono] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • set scope and build validation in dev when no options provided #99199
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Provide MSBuild properties to use the new libc++ configuration we plan on using in our builds #101773
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • Remove defensive copies in `System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext` #101161
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Add EdgeVisitor and ITracingNode to enable logging dependency graph edges to illink dependency loggers #101949
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Commit Accounting related changes #100380
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Refactor AdvSimd version of DecodeFromUTF8 #101620
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • Connection Activities in SocketsHttpHandler #101814
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Convert OAVariant interop to managed #100176
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • WIP: another workaround for hardcoded compiler versions #100828
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Exclude dependabot from community-contribution labeling #101742
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta
  • Support loading standalone GC from an absolute path using a new config named DOTNET_GCPath #101874
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Refactor mono_fixup_symbol_name #101681
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Support SV48 Virtual Memory Layout #101966
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Simplify some non-generic CompareTo methods #101545
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Tar: support GNU numeric format. #101172
    community-contribution, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [wasm] Where possible, use ReadableStream.pipeTo to load files into the heap #101982
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Make debug logs with string literals that create garbage conditional #101986
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use classes rather than records for parts of the incremental pipeline in interop generators and hide constructors #101740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
